meanings.sent1: The hithermost tree in the forest was easy to spot.
meanings.sent2: She pointed to the hithermost house on the street.
meanings.sent3: The hithermost chair in the room seemed to beckon me to sit.
meanings.sent4: His hithermost finger reached out to touch the painting.
meanings.sent5: The hithermost star in the sky shone brightly above us.

meanings.sent1: The hithermost mountain peak was a challenge to reach.
meanings.sent2: The hithermost island in the ocean was uninhabited.
meanings.sent3: The hithermost cloud in the sky looked like a fluffy pillow.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams took her to the hithermost corners of the universe.
meanings.sent5: The hithermost boundary of the kingdom was marked by a tall fence.
